text: Discuss: this single example of Trumpian graft is more corrupt than _all_ of the allegations and findings re Hillary's emails. @davidfrum, call your office.
author: jon_rauch

text: Inquiring minds want to know: Why is former Rep. O'Rourke considered presidential material? Specifics, please. https://www.chicagotribune.com/news/opinion/chapman/ct-perspec-chapman-beto-orourke-fundraising-obama-jfk-president-20190320-story.html … @SteveChapman13

text: Seriously, Republicans? Poll taxes? In 2019?

text: "We ask soldiers to risk their lives to defend the Constitution, but these cowards would not even risk their political careers." @MaxBoot

text: So dignified. Like her dad. We sure miss you, Senator.
author: jon_rauch

text: Isn't it wonderful that leading U.S. politicians now routinely call for the jailing of their opponents, and no one is surprised? The new normal. Don't tell me this POTUS is doing no damage to our democracy.
author: jon_rauch

text: Hey @lawfareblog folks, this is how it works, right? FBI decides whom to prosecute unless overruled by meddlesome DOJ? https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/03/13/lisa-page-obama-doj-ordered-fbi-not-to-prosecute-hillary-clinton/ … @Susan_Hennessey @qjurecic @benjaminwittes

text: For the record, conservatives (so-called) are now proposing and supporting deficits larger than the entire federal budget was when I started covering it in the 1980s. (Does anyone care?)
author: jon_rauch

text: Openly homosexual mayor schools evangelical VP re family values. Live long enough and truly you will see everything. #pornstarpresidency @PeteButtigieg
author: jon_rauch

text: Just to recap. Rep. Omar is a controversial figure in her party. Donald Trump is not a controversial figure in his party. One of these things is not like the other.
author: jon_rauch

text: "Omar wasn’t criticizing Israeli policies. She was criticizing Israel’s supporters by suggesting that they are not loyal Americans. That’s textbook anti-Semitism." @MaxBoot
author: jon_rauch

text: Imagine Republicans' reaction if Obama had done this! My day is not complete if I don't find myself saying that at least three times. Today's example via @MaxBoot
author: jon_rauch

text: An important book. Opened my eyes and will do the same for you. Fun to read, too. Congrats on (re)publication to @thischairrocks Ashton Applewhite!

text: More evidence, if any were needed, that this POTUS is serving in violation of his oath of office.

text: Another Republican elected official sounding like a mobster...threatening a witness, then retracting after the message is out. #NotEvenNixon.
author: jon_rauch

text: It will take years to sort through the human wreckage of people like Chris Christie and Cliff Sims (and Michael Cohen). Powerful review of two unintentionally self-revealing tell-alls. @davidfrum @TheAtlantic
author: jon_rauch

text: Almost.

text: "This is the most important vote that Republicans will make in their lives. And there is every indication that almost all of them will make the wrong choice." @MaxBoot on the state of emergency vote.

text: Thanks. More at http://www.happinesscurvebook.com !

text: .@MaxBoot: "If someone were ranting and raving like this on the street, you would  walk quickly away. Yet somehow we have become inured to this ranting and  raving from the most powerful man in the world."
author: jon_rauch

text: As David Brooks says in his beautiful column today, relationships don't scale. But depolarization might. @BetterAngelsUSA shows how. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F0kTl8aaDLs&feature=youtu.be …
author: jon_rauch

text: "The only real emergency here is the way that Trump is misusing the powers of the presidency." @MaxBoot
author: jon_rauch

text: Trump has statutory authority to repurpose money for his wall, so why declare an emergency? Answer: breaking norms and dividing the country is his business model. @jacklgoldsmith @lawfareblog
author: jon_rauch

text: Reagan had his Teflon, the ability to be liked better than his policies. Clinton had triangulation. Trump's secret weapon? Sociopathy. He's literally shameless. @maxboot
author: jon_rauch

text: Sure, the Dem prez candidates are flawed, sez @SteveChapman13, but POTUS "is not so much a person with flaws as an agglomeration of gross flaws shaped like a person."
author: jon_rauch
